name: QUADROPUS
description:
ControlsKeyAltJumpSpacebarMove LeftLeft ArrowAMove RightRight ArrowDInteractEPause / VolumeOESC

Synopsis

You play as Quadropus, a 4 legged cephalopod, waking up in a long-forgotten lab.

You hear a strange voice in your head, who offers to help guide you through puzzles and difficult, deadly obstacles, as you try to make your way out of the forgotten lab.

Technical

A lot of love went into the audio and music for this game, so having audio enabled is highly recommended. Press O or ESC during gameplay to adjust volume settings.

This game runs a lot better in the executable, so it's highly recommended that you download and play this game instead of running it in the browser. 

Story

In the year 2121, evil megacorp Azamon releases a new service that they call Elastic HaaS - Humanity as a Service. Real human minds are synthesized into general artificial intelligences, which are made available via a poorly documented API.

The following years were highly turbulent. Protests became activism, activism became terrorism, terrorism triggered cyberattacks, drone wars and eventually - complete nuclear devestation. Humanity wiped itself out by 2150.

The last of Azamons research labs survived and left but one survivor. The HaaS prototype Harold.

Harold has been living digitally for [REDACTED] years and has now found an unlikely ally in a strange bit of forgotten tech - a sentient quadropus, the very key to the conception of digital life.
